short_summary: Transport Canada is seeking three (3) resources to support the work being undertaken in the modernization of the Seafarer Certification Group, Marine Medical Unit concerning the record management and disposal of obsolete paper records.
description: See the attached document for more details.
duration_in_months: HYPOTHETICAL as it is not specified
full_summary:
===============

**Request for Proposal: Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialist**

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01025991

**Tender Closing Date:** March 28, 2023 at 2:00 p.m.

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Procurement Category:** SRV (Services)

**Description:**
 Transport Canada is seeking three (3) Information/Records Management/Recordkeeping Specialists to support the modernization of the Seafarer Certification Group, Marine Medical Unit, with regards to record management and disposal of obsolete paper records. The selected contractor will be responsible for quality assurance of records being disposed of and paper file disposal.

**Requirements:**

* The contract is expected to run from the contract award date to March 31, 2024, with the possibility of three (3) one-year extensions.
* The contractor will work on-site for 5 days a week, 7.5 hours a day.
* The contractor will be required to provide resources with expertise in information/records management and recordkeeping.

**Trade Agreements:**
 This notice is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Regions of Opportunity:**
 The proposed contract is open to all qualified bidders from Canada.

**Contact Information:**

* Fanie Charron
* Email: [fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca](mailto:fanie.charron@tc.gc.ca)
* Phone: (343) 574-8173

**Notice URL:**
 The full notice can be found at [canadabuys.canada.ca](http://canadabuys.canada.ca).

**Attachments:**
 The following attachments are available:

* [English version](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/02/15/966f80d
